snippet.title: Undertale Together: Next Soul - UnderEvent 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
After a very long time I'm back with a very big update for Undertale Together!

A branch new Undertale Adventure with
New Battle Modes: Fresh and dynamic battle systems designed for cooperative play, adding new challenges. 
Dialogue Revamp: Updated dialogues to reflect the two-player dynamic. 
Language Support: Currently added Italian and Spanish languages
New Skins: Customize your characters with a variety of new skins. 
And So Much More...

Download: https://gamebanana.com/mods/491652
Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BlPe_5AV1nI
UnderEvent 2024: https://youtu.be/Ho5jkOfUFtY
The amazing song used in the trailer by Dein0mite:  https://youtu.be/6CGSSidgf9c
Discord server:  https://discord.gg/yhZMgHe
